form.title: nf-core/sarek
form.description: Sarek is a workflow for detecting and annotating germline/somatic variants in WGS, WES and gene panel data. If you require assistance setting up your workflow please contact hutchdatacore@fredhutch.org to discuss data formats and parameters.

analysis_type.title: Experiment Design
analysis_type.description: Provide details on the experimental inputs to the analyzed dataset.

annotation.title: Variant Annotation
annotation.description: Select variant annotation tools and VEP plugins.

annotation_tool.title: Annotation tool(s)
annotation_tool.description: Please select one or both variant annotation tools.

vep_dbnsfp.title: dbNSFP plugin
vep_dbnsfp.description: Enable the use of the VEP dbNSFP plugin that retrieves data for missense variants.

vep_loftee.title: LOFTEE plugin
vep_loftee.description: Enable the use of the VEP LOFTEE plugin to identify LoF (loss-of-function) variation.

vep_spliceai.title: SpliceAI plugin
vep_spliceai.description: Enable the use of the VEP SpliceAI plugin to annotate variants predicted effect on splicing.

vep_spliceregion.title: SpliceRegion plugin
vep_spliceregion.description: Enable the use of the VEP SpliceRegion plugin to provide granular predictions of splicing effects.
